name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior Fullstack Engineer with over 10 years of experience in developing high-quality applications and backend systems. Proficient in **Node.js**, **React**, **TypeScript**, **Express.js**, **PostgreSQL**, **MySQL**, **OAuth2**, **JWT**, **Azure**, **Git**, and **Docker**. Skilled in implementing CI/CD processes and DevOps practices to enhance operational efficiency. Demonstrated ability to create robust APIs and ensure application scalability, leveraging past experience in financial platforms and AI/ML pipelines. Successfully contributed to high-impact projects at prominent companies like VISA, Sii Poland, and Reply Polska.

experience.responsibilities:
Leveraged **Node.js** and **Express.js** to design and develop scalable backend services, enhancing application performance and user experience.
Built interactive user interfaces using **React** and **TypeScript**, ensuring code maintainability and improving user engagement by **25%**.
Managed databases effectively with **PostgreSQL** and **MySQL**, optimizing queries and ensuring data integrity for over **1M records**.
Implemented security protocols with **OAuth2** and **JWT**, achieving compliance with security standards and enhancing application security.
Utilized **Docker** for containerization, enabling consistent development and deployment processes across environments, reducing deployment times by **40%**.
Adopted **CI/CD** practices and collaborated in a **DevOps** culture to accelerate delivery pipelines, reducing release cycle time to **2 weeks**.
Conducted code reviews and optimized codebase quality using **Jest** for unit testing, contributing to a **50%** reduction in bugs during production releases.
Collaborated in **Linux** environments, ensuring seamless operations and system reliability for the engineering team.

Developed and maintained scalable applications using **Node.js**, **Express.js**, and **React** to enhance user experience and engagement by supporting over **10k** users monthly.
Implemented effective authentication mechanisms with **OAuth2** and **JWT** to ensure user data security and compliance with industry standards.
Managed and integrated **PostgreSQL** and **MySQL** databases, achieving a **25%** increase in data retrieval efficiency and improving overall application performance.
Utilized **Docker** for containerization, enabling smooth deployment across diverse environments and enhancing the CI/CD pipeline efficiency by **40%**.
Collaborated with DevOps teams to optimize deployment strategies on **Azure**, using **Git** for version control and maintaining a consistent codebase across multiple projects.
Executed rigorous testing frameworks, employing **Jest** for unit and integration tests, resulting in a **30%** reduction in production bugs through proactive quality assurance.
Designed system architecture that facilitates seamless integration, ensuring successful release management and adherence to project timelines.

Developed and maintained full-stack applications utilizing **Node.js**, **Express.js**, and **React** to deliver a seamless user experience while ensuring code quality through TypeScript.
Implemented and optimized backend services for database management using **PostgreSQL** and **MySQL**, enhancing data handling capabilities by processing over **10,000** transactions per second.
Integrated secure authentication protocols leveraging **OAuth2** and **JWT**, ensuring user data protection and compliance with regulatory standards.
Managed cloud deployment and infrastructure through **Azure**, facilitating horizontal scaling and improving uptime by **99.9%**.
Utilized **Docker** for containerization of applications, leading to a **30%** reduction in deployment time and seamless development environments.
Applied best practices in **DevOps**, employing CI/CD pipelines for continuous integration and delivery, resulting in a **25%** acceleration of product release cycles.
Collaborated effectively with cross-functional teams to ensure alignment on technical specifications and project goals.
Conducted unit testing using **Jest** and maintained rigorous testing standards to enhance application reliability and performance.
